DOC.criteria: Women age 1840 year Primary secondary infertility Desire achieve pregnancy Basal FSH < 12 mIU/ML Moderate good ovarian reserve ( antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) > 1ng/ml , and/ antral follicle count ( AFC ) > 8 ovary ) Informed write consent partner BMI < 35 kg/mtr.sq .
